{{cpp/regex/regex_traits/title|getloc}}
{{cpp/regex/regex_traits/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|1=
locale_type getloc() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the current locale of the traits object. 

If {{lc|imbue()}} has been never called for this object, then the global locale at the time of the call is returned. Otherwise, the locale passed to the last call to {{lc|imbue()}} is returned.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current locale of the traits object.
